comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Now that the press is going through every sock drawer in Wasilla, I've come to the rather sad conclusion that, thanks to the Frenzy, I'll never hold an elected office: Wolf Blitzer: "It's said you once referred to a blogmate as a _wheeled carp with the personality of a trivet._ Any truth?" Me: "Well, maybe... but when you take it out of context like that... What I meant to say was..." Wolf Blitzer: "You claim to have ridden from CU's student center to the top of Flagstaff Mountain in just over seven minutes. Is that entirely accurate?" Me: "I rounded off." Wolf Blitzer: "Did you really ride a bicycle while wearing a kilt?" Me: "That's absurd! I can't believe my opponent is spreading such..." Wolf Blitzer: "We have pictures." Me: "Oh... Well look, if Rudy Giuliani can go to the 104 St. Gym in toreador pants and a very nice peasant top, why is it so bad for me to do a little drag racing of my own, so to speak?" Wolf Blitzer: "How do you rate you chances in November?" Me: "Ummm..."
